name: The Mean Craps Machine
overview: The Mean Craps Machine is an early craps game for the TRS-80 system. All betting occurs via text input. It is a gambling simulation for 1 - 8 players using Atlantic City Odds. The player can also compete against computer opponents, who get no advantage over human players. Players take turns placing bets, and rolling dice. The players compete until the house has collected all money.
